## ğŸ“‹ **ä½ å½“å‰çš„æ¶æ„å°±æ˜¯æœ€ä½³å®è·µ**ï¼š

function compressImage(imageData, quality) {
    const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    
    // æœ¬åœ°å‹ç¼©
    ctx.drawImage(imageData.img, 0, 0, width, height);

}
